I’m one of 3 members of Transept, and this was our debut album. We wrote, mixed and produced it ourselves.

Artrocker, Word, Mojo, Uncut and Rock-a-rolla gave it ★★★★.

Artrocker called it“a stunning piece of progressive space-rock melancholia”.

Total Music said it sounds like“Fuck Buttons jamming with Acid Mothers Temple or Amon Düül ”.

On the back of it we supported GY!BE, Walls and Islet.

I designed the logo and artwork. We screen-printed the covers.
